title: [1.4.7-1.7.10][SP/LAN/MP]灯笼（LANTERN MOD）——可携带的动态光源
author: CI010
txt_content:
本帖最后由 CI010 于 2014-8-28 11:45 编辑 





lantern_mod_logo_by_wh_reaper-d6lkmt7.png (183.35 KB, 下载次数: 1404)

下载附件

2014-2-26 15:44 上传





你有没有想过你会拥有一个可携带的光源？当然，现在你装了这个mod，你就有了！
灯笼mod本来是CaveGen mod的一部分，但是作者决定把它俩分开，因为有些人只想要灯笼的特性而不想要CaveGen的特性

注意：这个mod相当于是CaveGen mod的插件。这意味着你既可以单独使用它俩，也同时可以一起使用，并且你可以用Glow shard（来自于CaveGeo）来制作灯笼
如果你带着灯笼飞，灯笼的光并不会移动的像你飞的那么快，有的时候光会渲染的不对头……你只有走过去让他们刷新一下就好，不会有什么大问题。

合成：
合成灯笼的方法：（你可以在config文档里调整萤石粉位置的合成材料，它也可以是别的。）

更变集：


1.44 - You can now hang lantern from slabs, stairs and fences, some minor improvements of the code

1.43 - Light value of placed latern now corresponds to the light value emitted by lantern held in hand, lightning algorithm improved - you now don't have to make a step after you equip lantern in order for it to start emitting light, dynamic recipe - you can now set which item/block will be used in recipe instead of glowstone! Just change the id in config file(note that if you are playing on server, only server set recipe will work, no matter what you have set in your config)

1.42 - Major code cleanup, new config entry for servers allowing them to force their setting of belt lantern (on/off) to connected clients. This setting is reset each time player enters a world, which means no restart of Minecraft is required in case you want to switch to different server or play in SP, Faster packet handling on server side

1.41 - Lantern 3D model visible when held in hand (this can be turned on and off in config file), amount of light emitted by lantern can now be configured via cofig file(it can be value from 5 to 15, 10 being default), when on server amount of emitted light is determined by value set on server side, unlike the belt lantern option

1.4 - Complete rewrite of the lighting algorithm - faster, better, easier to maintain , fixed bug that prevented this mod from working on servers, fixed bug that could potentially cause problems with tile entities on servers, other players can now see light emitted by your lantern!

1.3 - Added new option to config file. If set to 1, lantern will emit light when in player's hotbar. If set to 0, lantern will emit light only when held(Default is 0). Some code improvements.

1.2 - Recipe with shard from CaveGen moved into CaveGen plugin container and removed from this mod

1.1 - Custom model for lantern. When the lantern is placed on top of the block, the lantern sits on the block. When the lantern is placed under the block, the lantern will hang from there. The lantern will be rotated towards you when you place it.
